name: Anti-Metal AI Build
description:
This is the final project for GDE-210 and (in my case) GAM-420.

The grounded enemies use my custom pathfinding system. 

TEAM:

Liam Shelton: Grounded Character AI, Combat, Lighting

Nate Kaplan: Models and Level Design

Khoi Ho: Flying Character AI, Teleport Mechanics, Boss Phases
